asset.title: Emerica Presents: Collin Provost Draws the Line
asset.description:
The Provost Slim: http://emerica.com/shoes/the-provost-...

Provost does what he does best, taking the line less traveled, at the legendary Santa Rosa Skatepark in Northern Cali. Collin's second shoe, The Provost Slim, is a slimmed down version of his first pro model, coming in at $55.

The Provost slim is both suede and canvas, featuring a thin padded tongue and collar for extra comfort, as well as one-piece toecap and ollie area for durability. Staying true to Collin’s original, the Slim is vulcanized and comes equipped with a gum rubber outsole and Triangle Tread pattern.

Music by: @thedeadmeadow
Album - Warble Womb
Track - Warble Womb I
Website - deadmeadow.com
